text: Nedelcho Krumov Beronov () (22 July 1928 - 4 July 2015) was a Bulgarian jurist, right-wing politician and Constitutional Court chairman. He was a presidential candidate in the 2006 presidential elections. ==Other websites== * Official website of Beronov's presidential nomination Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Judges
title: Nedelcho Beronov
